short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for see what is your actual Pace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
42 Campus have change the Cursus system and introduces the Paced System.
But currently the Pace level are not display on the profile intra page.
This extension allows you to get your actual Pace level and display on the main profile intra page.

V3 of the intranet is obligatory.
